name: Boxed In (itch) (Ryan R Burns)
description:
Made by Ryan R Burns for Ludum Dare 52
How To Play

Space - Jump
Shift - Stop

Objective

Keep doing laps. That's about it. Jump and Stall your way around the box and dodge the DVD logo.

The Story

Your name is Racer McTavish and there is only 1 thing you know how to do...
Go. Moderately. Fast.
But this stupid DVD logo just hates you. Why? Who knows. But you also know how to do 2 other things. Jump and Stop.
So a total of 3 things that you know how to do...

Are you gamer enough to get the high score? ...I'm not entirely sure what that score would be. There are no leaderboards.

So, just play it for a few minutes then like... stop?

Music: Eggy (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/eggy-toast/game-music)
Tileset: Monochrome Caves - Adam Saltsman (https://adamatomic.itch.io/mc-caves)
